name: Cycle Idle RPG
description:
An RPG where your character fights automatically, even when you're offline!

Gain levels, craft equipment, and optimize your build to face stronger enemies who'll challenge your character's power in different ways!

As you advance, you'll unlock new subsystems that will help you strengthen your character - will you focus on growing your garden of beneficial plants? Growing your knowledge of monsters in the Bestiary? Creating a powerful deck in the card-based minigame?
